# Exercises {#install .setup style="blue"}

```{r DA peaks, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(presto)
load("data/pbmc_edited.RData")
# change back to working with peaks instead of gene activities
DefaultAssay(pbmc) <- 'peaks'

# wilcox is the default option for test.use
da_peaks <- FindMarkers(
  object = pbmc,
  ident.1 = "CD4 Naive",
  ident.2 = "CD14+ Monocytes",
  test.use = 'wilcox',
  min.pct = 0.1
)

head(da_peaks)

plot1 <- VlnPlot(
  object = pbmc,
  features = rownames(da_peaks)[1],
  pt.size = 0.1,
  idents = c("CD4 Naive","CD14+ Monocytes")
)
plot2 <- FeaturePlot(
  object = pbmc,
  features = rownames(da_peaks)[1],
  pt.size = 0.1
)

plot1 | plot2
```
